name: vertigo
summary: In this assignment we were asked to make a tribute to Christopher Nolan’s best movies.

target.one: The aim of the project was to collect information about Christopher Nolans way of thinking in his movies.
target.two: This is a storytelling one pager, with chosen movies we figured would fit for this assignment.

responsiveinfo: Part of the assignment was to make sure, it was responsive. We used mediaqueries in order to do so.
